channel.title: Comments on: The best form of [viva] defense is chilling the fuck out

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/the-best-form-of-viva-defense-is-chilling-the-fuck-out/#comment-652">Dr Jojo Scoble</a>.
Cheers, Jojo! Hope to see you again soon too, all the best! :)

item.title: By: Dr Jojo Scoble
item.dc:creator: Dr Jojo Scoble
item.description: You're a legend, Jon, and an easy peer to support. I look forward to meeting you again soon on the 'open' circuit. ?
item.content:encoded: You’re a legend, Jon, and an easy peer to support. I look forward to meeting you again soon on the ‘open’ circuit. ?
